game.name: Forgetable
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Forgetable is a colourful single player point and click game. The goal is to find objects that are misplaced and don't belong to the place. There are 7+ different scenes with 300+ objects to be found. You can use help through phone button to navigate you through the search.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Forgetable is a colourful single player point and click game. The goal is to find objects that are misplaced and don't belong to the place. There are 7+ different scenes with 300+ objects to be found. You can use help through phone button to navigate you through the search.
